The best home for modern WordPress sites

*What could be causing the error?*
The hosting plan may not be sufficient for the traffic your site is
getting. If that's the case, your site may require more PHP threads.
Currently, your PHP thread limit is 16. To see which plan might better meet
your PHP thread needs, you can compare plans
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWuv7OZvOFp8p-2BoNCeW1TJ-2F9G1OlDJ88dIqcx7kKGhxdZ-2Bdf7F_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKB9Fqee7bhw1dAGN8873q9wxw1Lo3c1NQaCgdrp9J7GFQ6o-2FrcPCu1-2FQc-2FwPJyFrJZOHXapMP7KeN0pE9o3D4MCRIdkHT4EiPWl9IQbDRrlobw8zgRAV3sCp1Sp5XN0gqlNlhINRJlPMuvnnjEYgtyBsyalaX-2F0SUPQEpVdyTi6YaGXB7G7c09hDwJ9YHA0VJA-3D>
.

you can ignore this message. We'll keep monitoring, but we'll only notify
you again if the error persists for more than 6 hours.
If you have any questions feel free to reach out to our support team by
responding to this email or by opening a conversation in MyKinsta. We are
